roomZero.gameStart:
You awaken to find yourself in a strange room...
You have no idea where you are or how you got here.
You rub your eyes and look around to see the room only has one door.
On the left side of the room is a small table with what seems to be a note sitting on it.
roomZero.inspectLeft:
You inspect the table to the left and find a note:
	Welcome to Eric's house!
	Find your way through the rooms to escape. Each room has a locked door
	that will take you to the next room. It can be unlocked by solving the
	challenge of that room.

	Oh, I almost forgot.

	Eric is also here and he’s looking for you.
	It would be in your best interest to not let him find you.
	The more attempts it takes to solve a challenge the more likely it is
	he stumbles into the same room.

	GOOD LUCK!
roomZero.inspectLeftEmpty: You Inspect the table and find it empty.
roomZero.inspectRight: The room is empty to the right
roomZero.inspectFloor: There is nothing on the floor.
roomZero.openDoorUnlocked: The door opens and you proceed to the next room.
roomZero.askShaq:
What's up, I'm Shaq!
I'm here to help guide you out of Eric's house.
If you get stuck, feel free to type 'ask Shaq' at any point and i'll do my best to help you in your escape.
To get started, why don't you try inspecting that table to your left and reading that note.
roomZero.invalidCommand: That command is invalid! Please choose a proper command from the list.

roomOne.enterRoom:
Welcome to Room 1 - Knife Room:

To your left you see a bookshelf.
To your right you see a table.
Straight ahead is the locked door to the next room.
roomOne.inspectLeft: You inspect the bookshelf to your left. You find a knife and put it in your backpack.
roomOne.inspectLeftEmpty: You inspect the bookshelf. Just a bunch of dusty worn out books.
roomOne.inspectRight:
You inspect the table on the right. You find a knife and read:
	'This dang old door lock has been messed up for weeks. I just keep jimmying it open with a knife.'
roomOne.inspectFloor: There is nothing on the floor.
roomOne.openDoorLocked: The door is locked with a big rusty padlock. There must be some way to open it...
roomOne.openDoorUnlocked: You use the knife to jimmy open the lock. The door opens and you proceed to the next room...
roomOne.askShaq:
To figure out what the room challenge is, try to open the locked door.
Make sure you look for helpful clues or items in every room.
Maybe the note on that table can offer up a clue.
roomOne.invalidCommand: That command is invalid! Please choose a proper command from the list.

roomTwo.enterRoom:
Welcome to Room 2 - Word Order Room:

To your left you see a table.
To your right you see a desk.
You also see something shiny on the floor in front of you.
Straight ahead is the locked door to the next room.
roomTwo.inspectLeft:
You inspect the table to your left.
You find an Onion and put it in your backpack.
Might come in handy or make a good snack later.
roomTwo.inspectLeftEmpty: You inspect the table to your left and find it empty.
roomTwo.inspectRight:
You inspect the desk on the right.
You find a Hammer and a Pencil sitting on top and an Emerald in the top drawer.
You put them both in your backpack.
roomTwo.inspectRightEmpty: Just an old empty Desk over there.
roomTwo.inspectFloor:
You inspect the floor.
You find a Needle on the ground and put it in your backpack.
That would've been uncomfortable to step on.
roomTwo.inspectFloorEmpty: Nothing on the floor but dirt... Eric could stand to sweep up...
roomTwo.openDoorLocked: An offering of four objects in the correct order is required to OPEN this door.
roomTwo.openDoorLockedWithItems: You have collected the correct items. Enter them in the correct order to open this door.
roomTwo.openDoorLockedIncorrectOrder: That is the wrong order! BE GONE!
roomTwo.openDoorUnlocked:
You have successfully entered the four object in the correct order.
The door opens and you proceed to the next room...
roomTwo.askShaq:
Those are some random objects in this room.
Perhaps the order of the objects doesn't have anything to do with the items themselves...
roomTwo.invalidCommand: That command is invalid! Please choose a proper command from the list.

roomThree.enterRoom:
You made it Room 3 - The Riddle Room:
In this room you will need to solve 3 riddles in order to advance to the next room, good luck
roomThree.inspectLeft:
You inspect the Annabelle doll to your left. You find a note, the note reads
	What gets wetter the more it dries?
roomThree.inspectLeftCorrect: You have correctly answered this question, the door started shaking
roomThree.inspectLeftHint: You have chosen the wrong answer, think about a sponge or something..."
roomThree.inspectRight:
You look over to the right and find a Leprechaun, it looks like it's alive. You pry the note from its hand, the note reads
	The person who makes it has no need for it; the person who buys it has no use for it. The person who uses it can neither see nor feel it. What is it?
roomThree.inspectRightCorrect: You have correctly answered this question, the door slowly opens a little, still can't fit through
roomThree.inspectRightHint: You have chosen the wrong answer, would you rather be 6ft High or 6ft below
roomThree.inspectFloor:
On the floor there is a Ouija board, it spells out
	David's parents have three sons: Snap, Crackle, and what’s the name of the third son?
roomThree.inspectFloorCorrect: You have correctly answered this question, you can start to see through to the other room
roomThree.inspectFloorHint: You have chosen the wrong answer, if you choose Pop you need to stop
roomThree.openDoorLocked: Solve the three riddles to open this door.
roomThree.openDoorUnlocked: You have successfully completed all 3 Riddles in the room, you may advance to the next room
roomThree.askShaq: The answer to each question is just one word, don't overthink it. Each word is <=6 letters
roomThree.invalidCommand: That command is invalid! Please choose a proper command from the list.

roomFour.enterRoom:
Welcome to Room 4 - Game Room:

An anvil sits in the middle of the room
To your right is a big storage shelf full of odds and ends
To your left you see an old dresser
Straight ahead is the locked door to the next room.
roomFour.inspectLeft:
You open the door of the old dresser and find a pair of mirrored glasses and put them on.
Very Stylish!
roomFour.inspectLeftEmpty: Theres nothing left in the empty old dresser.
roomFour.inspectRight: The shelf contains several piles of supplies. You collect some paper, a thin sheet of metal, and a wrench.
roomFour.inspectRightEmpty: Nothing else of good use on the shelf.
roomFour.inspectFloor:
You walk up to the anvil in the center of the room. Could come in handy to craft something.
Would you like to craft something? (y/n)
roomFour.inspectFloorCraftHat: You've crafted a metal hat! You put it on, a perfect fit.
roomFour.inspectFloorCraftAirplane: You've crafted a paper airplane. You throw it at the locked door... it does nothing.
roomFour.inspectFloorCraftFail: You cant craft anything with this combo.
roomFour.openDoorLocked:
A mirror hangs on the door with a reflection of yourself.
Your reflection smiles back and holds up one hand flat with the other fist sitting on top.
He is challenging you to rock-paper-scissors! (Best 2 out of 3)
roomFour.openDoorLockedLoser: The Door has won this round.
roomFour.openDoorUnlocked:
YOU WIN! The door opens and you feel the cool breeze of fresh air on your face.
You step outside the house and realize you have escaped.You have escaped Eric!
roomFour.askShaq:
That is no ordinary mirror on the door... i think its somehow reading your mind!
If you can find a way to keep it out of your head i bet you can beat it!

ericAppears:
Eric Appeared!!!!
He lunges at you violently at full speed with crackhead like energy. He picks you up as if you were a toy AND HE GIVES YOU A hug :)
Eric asks why you were running through his house? Turns out, he just wanted to talk to you. He just wanted a friend.
